issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

resolution.description: A fix for this issue is checked into the tree and tested.
resolution.name: Fixed

fields.summary: Multiple project between join operators may affect join reordering using constraints

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

issuetype.description: A problem which impairs or prevents the functions of the product.
issuetype.name: Bug

status.description: A resolution has been taken, and it is awaiting verification by reporter. From here issues are either reopened, or are closed.
status.name: Resolved

components.name: CBO
components.description: All issues dealing with Hive's cost based optimizer and its interaction with Optiq

fields.summary: Join reordering may not be triggered if all joins in plan are created by decorrelation logic

ATTACHMENT ID: 12944802 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

[~jcamachorodriguez] I have rebased and uploaded a new patch.

ATTACHMENT ID: 12945057 - PreCommit-HIVE-Build

Updated the golden files. Subquery tests have join reordering and as a result HiveSemiJoin rule, to covert to Left Semi Join, is not kicking in from some tests. There are other tests which now have Semi Join.

I have opened HIVE-20826 to improve HiveSemiJoin rule.
